players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm shocked that Alice was killed. We should all share our thoughts on who might be the mafioso."
Charlie: "I know Diana is the mafioso from my investigation last night. We should vote her out."
Diana: "I'm deeply saddened by Alice's sudden demise. Let us all remain calm and focused during this investigation to ensure justice is served."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Diana is the mafioso. We must vote her out now to save the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
